title: DAILY DETOX: Comprehensive Formula | NU-TEK Nutrition
description: DAILY DETOX features a Prebiotic Gut Fiber Support Blend, an Alkalizing Blend, and a Cellular Detox Support Blend in a tasty, easily-mixable, powdered formula.
cleaned_text: DAILY DETOX Studies have shown that certain nutrients and foods that we eat may help support the cleansing of your body at the cellular level. Addressing the body's cleansing system is an excellent approach for optimal health and wellness. This approach includes eating the right foods and nutrients that help support good bacteria balance in the gut, aiding the body's pH balance, and helping to rid the body of toxins. Introducing DAILY DETOX by NU-TEK Nutrition®. This comprehensive, powdered formula contains three key blends: a Prebiotic Gut Fiber Support Blend, an Alkalizing Blend, and a Cellular Detox Support Blend. With hand-selected selected ingredients like FiberSmart®, Ground Flax Seed, Cranberry, Apple Cider Vinegar, Lemon Juice, Milk Thistle and Green Matcha Tea, this easy-to-mix powder can become a new weapon in your daily health and wellness arsenal to help you feel invigorated, renewed, and refreshed. SUGGESTED USE: As a dietary supplement, mix one scoop with 8-12 ounces of cold water and consume within 60 minutes. Do not exceed one serving per day. This product is only intended for adults, 18 years of age or older. NOTICE: This product contains senna. Read and follow directions carefully. Do not use if you have or develop diarrhea, loose stools, or abdominal pain because senna may worsen these conditions and be harmful to your health. Consult your physician if you have frequent diarrhea or if you are pregnant, nursing, taking medication, or have a medical condition. ALLERGY INFORMATION: Manufactured in a facility that processes milk, eggs, fish, shellfish, tree nuts, peanuts, wheat, and soy.
